author: jeremyakatsa
content: For those interested in working on the Sharded-data portion of the Ethereum 2 Upgrade: https://ethereum.org/en/eth2/shard-chains/

author: joshuaisbuilding
content: Thanks for sharing this. I work on the Ethereum.org team. Just wanted to leave an open comment to say that whilst we strive keep the site as upto date and relevant as possible there are definitely some pages lacking sufficient content or pages that are out of date.

author: joshuaisbuilding
content: If anyone spots such a page we massively appreciate PRs or issues üò¨üôè (and as well as helping the community you might get a shiny POAP as a reward)

author: blockdev
content: Hi, I am an applicant on the next cdap program. Is there a way to learn and get involved zk-rollup development work?

author: potuz
content:
Hi guys, perhaps this is unreasonably annoying, but there's been a bit of movement in the cdap repo and the spec repo that I personally care more with conversations that belong here or with DM, an example is this
https://github.com/ethereum-cdap/cohort-one/issues/9#issuecomment-922374222
Filtering email is part of our day when you have a bunch of things that you follow
